A recent Pew Research Center survey concluded that increased public interest in Egypt did not keep pace with the growth in media coverage, and in an earlier poll, 52% of respondents said they had heard "little or nothing" about the anti-government protests. To them, Simon Cowell leaving "American Idol" qualifies as big international news.
